title: Affleck Back to Batman? A New Spider-Woman? Plus, Lonesome Dove Pt. 4
description:
Following announcements about upcoming Spider-Woman, Kraven the Hunter, and Batman projects, Chris and Andy weigh in on the news and the stars who could be behind each project (8:15). Then, in preparation for the finale of 'I May Destroy You,' they break down the latest episode and discuss the success Michaela Coel has had in her first season (27:50). Plus, the last installment of the 'Lonesome Dove' series (38:40).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
